text: Pouzolles () is a commune in the Hérault department and Occitanie in southern France. == Activities == The village has a small collection of shops (bakery, superette, tobacconist) and several chambres d'hôtes. There are other activities, such as a post office, a nearby paintball, a seasonal gallery and of course the local wine industry. == Places of interest == * the château (see pictures) * the village center, built as a circulade == Demography == ==Related pages== * Communes of the Hérault department == References == ==Other websites== * Official Pouzolles website Category:Communes in Hérault
title: Pouzolles
